content: The privacy and data collection of the application is outlined below.
cookiesContent: The application does not use any cookies to store your data. Your answers and preferences are stored in your browser‚Äôs local storage for a better user experience. This data can only be accessed by your device, not by the application‚Äôs publisher.
dataContent: Usage data is collected anonymously for research purposes and to improve the application using Google Analytics. The data cannot be connected to any one person. The data collected includes your answers to the questions, the time spent answering the questions and in other sections and the results viewed.
dataConsentIntro: If you do not want to share your data, please check the box below.
dataConsentLabel: I do not want to share my anonymized data for research.
title: Privacy
